TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A general term for tumors of the central nervous system, including astrocytomas, ependymal tumors, glioblastoma multiforme, and primitive neuroectodermal tumors.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Término general para los tumores del sistema nervioso central, que comprende astrocitomas, tumores ependimales, glioblastoma multiforme y tumores neuroectodérmicos primitivos.
